title: Ni ai pawhin i eng zawk e
lyrics:
Ni ai pawhin i eng zawk e,
Aw ka chhandamtu Lalber;
I hmangaih avang hianin,
Ka rilru a lawm em em.

Ni ai pawhin i eng zawk e,
I eng zawk, ni aiin i eng zawk;
I vanram ropui takah chuan,
Thimna chu a awm tawh lo.

Lawmna zawng zawng ka neihte chu,
I ropuinate nen chuan;
Ngai teh, ka ram chan turte chu,
Chatuan i ta reng a ni.

Aw, i khawngaihna ropui chu,
Ka tan thil lawmawm a ni;
Aw, chu ram eng mawi tak mai chu,
Keima tan buatsaih a ni.

Chatuana ka nunna turin,
Lalpa, ka tan i lo thi;
Ka leibat zawng zawng min tlaksak,
Chatuanin ka fak ang che.
